vexMod:ConsolationPrize.NAME: Consolation Prize
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, gain #yGold equal to HP lost.

vexMod:PlagueVial.NAME: Plague Vial
vexMod:PlagueVial.FLAVOR: The bosses must take their vitamin gummies.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies in non-Boss combats have #b15% less HP.

vexMod:ColdYogurt.NAME: Cold Yogurt
vexMod:ColdYogurt.FLAVOR: You wonder if your enemies are lactose-intolerant.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yChannel #b1 #yFrost.

vexMod:ShiftingSkin.NAME: Shifting Skin
vexMod:ShiftingSkin.FLAVOR: Your body flows fluidly, changing to adapt to each situation...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 stack of ANY random #gbuff.

vexMod:ProtectorBot.NAME: Protector Bot
vexMod:ProtectorBot.FLAVOR: This little bot dives in to take attacks when you're wide open.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b2 or less cards during your turn, gain #b5 #yBlock at the end of the turn.

vexMod:PainConverter.NAME: Pain Converter
vexMod:PainConverter.FLAVOR: The machine seems to be magnetically attracted to your exposed injuries.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive #b10 or more unblocked attack damage, draw #b1 additional card and gain [E] next turn.

vexMod:BetterTron.NAME: Better-O-Tron
vexMod:BetterTron.FLAVOR: Mechanical device certain to improve your life!
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b3 unupgraded cards you add into your deck are #yupgraded.

vexMod:GhostlyGear.NAME: Ghostly Gear
vexMod:GhostlyGear.FLAVOR: The sword and shield are more difficult to see each time you look.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a πStrike or Defend, #yExhaust it.

vexMod:CursedCompass.NAME: Cursed Compass
vexMod:CursedCompass.FLAVOR: No matter which way you turn, it always points forwards ...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Future maps contain only #b1 path.

vexMod:BejeweledOrb.NAME: Bejeweled Orb
vexMod:BejeweledOrb.FLAVOR: You have an urge to match items of similar color.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have #b3 of the same type of Orb in a row, #yEvoke them and gain #b1 Orb slot.

vexMod:MemoryStick.NAME: Memory Locket
vexMod:MemoryStick.FLAVOR: If you squeeze it hard enough you can remember the open beta.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your first turn, #yRetain your hand.

vexMod:CoolingFan.NAME: Cooling Fan
vexMod:CoolingFan.FLAVOR: This fan helps you save processes when performing monster solution options.

vexMod:Cooldron.NAME: Cooldron
vexMod:Cooldron.FLAVOR: This cauldron is a lot cooler than any regular old cauldron.
DESCRIPTIONS: All Potions you find are Entropic Brews.

vexMod:InvisibilityCloak.NAME: Invisible Cloak
vexMod:InvisibilityCloak.FLAVOR: You're far too modest to "wear" this.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose #b1 #yStrength.

vexMod:CodeSmelter.NAME: Code Smelter
vexMod:CodeSmelter.FLAVOR: Combines subprocesses into one big clump. Simple!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an Orb, trigger its passive ability.

vexMod:TanglingVine.NAME: Tangling Vine
vexMod:TanglingVine.FLAVOR: Don't take this the wrong way.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, lose #b3 #yBlock.

vexMod:MindDevourer.NAME: Mind Devourer
vexMod:MindDevourer.FLAVOR: Mm, shiny! Wait, what was your name again?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of combat, remove the oldest card in your deck.

vexMod:HappyDrink.NAME: Happy Drink
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b2. Whenever you enter a shop, increase your Max HP by #b2.

vexMod:ShortStop.NAME: Short Stop
vexMod:ShortStop.FLAVOR: Weathered from hundreds of home runs.
DESCRIPTIONS: Future maps are #b9 floors long. If stuck, use the console's debug true command to teleport to the boss, then use debug false.

vexMod:ThoughtMold.NAME: Helpful Mold
vexMod:ThoughtMold.FLAVOR: This mold siphons off bits of your shield to feed itself.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yBlock, gain #b1 #yStrength this turn.

vexMod:SalvageTools.NAME: Salvaging Tools
vexMod:SalvageTools.FLAVOR: "Curious! These primitive things are utterly useless." -Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a card, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b1 this turn.

vexMod:ChargeUpper.NAME: Charge Upper
vexMod:ChargeUpper.FLAVOR: "Oops, I fell asleep without plugging it in..."

vexMod:FocusSash.NAME: Focus Sash
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die while you have at least #b10 HP, heal to #b1 HP instead.

vexMod:PowerCharger.NAME: Backup Battery
vexMod:PowerCharger.FLAVOR: Conserve energy! Shut off Orb slots when you're not using them.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, gain #b3 #yBlock.

vexMod:StrikeShooter.NAME: Strike Shooter
vexMod:StrikeShooter.FLAVOR: All your sword-firing needs in one medium package!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of every third turn, play a πStrike at a random target.

vexMod:BigBerry.NAME: Big Berry
vexMod:BigBerry.FLAVOR: You had no idea they could get this big.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b22.

vexMod:RetaliationKit.NAME: Retaliation Kit
vexMod:RetaliationKit.FLAVOR: All you need to disappear in a burst of smoke! Smoke no longer included.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time your #yBlock is broken each combat, apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies.

vexMod:KeyChain.NAME: Key Chain
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play your first targeted #yAttack each combat, the enemy loses #yStrength equal to damage taken until the end of this turn.

vexMod:CardConverter.NAME: Box of Bandaids
vexMod:CardConverter.FLAVOR: Vends only when shown cool techniques.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card into your deck, heal #b3 HP.

vexMod:CursedBlade.NAME: Sword of Lies
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 #yStrength. At the start of each combat, add a random #rCurse into your hand.

vexMod:DrawConverter.NAME: Dusty Game Cartridge
vexMod:DrawConverter.FLAVOR: It's unclear which system the game was meant for.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card (besides your hand each turn), gain #b1 #yBlock.

vexMod:BrokenBowl.NAME: Broken Bowl
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add an unupgraded card to your deck, #yUpgrade it and lose #b2 Max HP.

vexMod:PillTracker.NAME: Pill Tracker
vexMod:PillTracker.FLAVOR: Always remember to take your medication on time!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b5, remove all of your debuffs.

vexMod:SlimeArmor.NAME: Scavenger Helm
vexMod:SlimeArmor.FLAVOR: Used by the tribes far from the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #yRetain up to #b1 card.

vexMod:ScavengeHelm.NAME: Writhing Mask
vexMod:ScavengeHelm.FLAVOR: It squirms on your face uncomfortably.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b4 #yMalleable.
Upon receiving Attack damage, gains #b4 #yBlock. NL #yBlock gain increases as #yMalleable is triggered. NL Resets to #b4 at the start of your turn.

vexMod:ToySword.NAME: Toy Sword
vexMod:ToySword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you a little sword charm!
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 less #yStrength. Whenever you play an #yAttack, the enemy loses #b2 #yStrength this turn.

vexMod:DoubleEdgedSword.NAME: Double-Edged Sword
vexMod:DoubleEdgedSword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you an overly sharp blade!
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b3 #yStrength. ALL enemies start combat with #b1 #yThorns.

vexMod:BroadSword.NAME: Broadsword
vexMod:BroadSword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you a slightly oversized weapon!
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 less card each turn. Start each combat with #b4 #yStrength.

vexMod:RustySword.NAME: Rusty Sword
vexMod:RustySword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you a crunchy sword...
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 less #yStrength. ALL enemies start combat with #b2 less #yStrength.

vexMod:DrainingSword.NAME: Draining Sword
vexMod:DrainingSword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you a vampiric sword!
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 less #yStrength. Whenever you play an #yAttack, heal #b1 HP.

vexMod:ImaginarySword.NAME: Imaginary Sword
vexMod:ImaginarySword.FLAVOR: Already, your memories of a smith feel faint...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove #b2 #yAttacks from your deck.

vexMod:InfernalSword.NAME: Infernal Sword
vexMod:InfernalSword.FLAVOR: This sword burns endlessly. You can't even hold it...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a random #yAttack into your hand. NL It costs #b0 this turn.

vexMod:VoiceBox.NAME: Voice Box
DESCRIPTIONS: My sword shall purge you all...
Feel the power of the demons!
The demonic power surges within me!
My rage burns hotter than yours!
Again we dance the endless battle.
The bigger the beast, NL the harder they fall.
Have you got any smoke bombs?
It's always better to stay prepared.
Another piece of my deadly puzzle.
PREPARE FOR DESTRUCTION NL PREPARE FOR DESTRUCTION
DESTROY DESTROY NL DESTROY DESTROY NL DESTROY DESTROY

vexMod:RobotsGift.NAME: Robot's Gift
vexMod:RobotsGift.FLAVOR: The thankful boon of a strange automaton.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 Orb slots.

vexMod:MidasArmor.NAME: Golden Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: Your HP and Max HP are ALWAYS set equal to your #yGold. NL Instead of losing HP, lose twice that much #yGold.

vexMod:TimeEaterHat.NAME: Snail's Watch
vexMod:TimeEaterHat.FLAVOR: Someone is going to want this back.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b12 cards in a single combat, end your turn and gain #b2 #yStrength.

vexMod:BerrySword.NAME: Berry Sword
vexMod:BerrySword.FLAVOR: Tiny bites of this sword invigorate you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b8. The first card you play each combat is removed from your deck.

vexMod:Dragonfruit.NAME: Dragon Fruit
vexMod:Dragonfruit.FLAVOR: As a connoisseur would say, piquant.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b5. At the end of your turn, deal #b1 damage to ALL enemies for each #yAttack played this turn.

vexMod:VialOfGreed.NAME: Vial of Greed
vexMod:VialOfGreed.FLAVOR: It jiggles against your leg when you're short of change.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yPoison, gain #yGold equal to #yPoison applied.

vexMod:RegenHeart.NAME: Regenerative Virus
vexMod:RegenHeart.FLAVOR: The side effects are ... best left unsaid.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, set your Max HP to #b30. NL At the end of combat, heal to full HP.

vexMod:LichBottle.NAME: Lich's Phylactery
vexMod:LichBottle.FLAVOR: It feels cold in your hands, no matter what you do ...
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPrevent #pALL #pHP #ploss. For every #b10 damage prevented, remove a random card from your deck. When your deck has no cards, you #rlose.

vexMod:BarristanHead.NAME: Bandanna of Resilience
vexMod:BarristanHead.FLAVOR: In your strangest dreams, it appears and yells orders at you.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have #b30 or less HP at the start of your turn, gain #b5 #yBlock.

vexMod:HeadHunter.NAME: Skull Hunter
vexMod:HeadHunter.FLAVOR: You're bringing this conflict to a head.
DESCRIPTIONS: Elites drop an additional Rare card reward.

vexMod:MallPass.NAME: Mall Pass
vexMod:MallPass.FLAVOR: Now you can get the great discounts!
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL #y? rooms contain The Merchant. Whenever you encounter The Merchant, gain #b50 #yGold.

vexMod:FloorLord.NAME: Ssserpent's Blood
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, gain #b1 #yGold for each floor you have climbed.

vexMod:HatredEngine.NAME: Hatred Engine
vexMod:HatredEngine.FLAVOR: They all deserve your blade! Go! Fight!

vexMod:EndlessSickness.NAME: Endless Sickness
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, shuffle a #rVirus into your draw pile.
Viruses are #rCurse cards that duplicate themselves when drawn.

vexMod:GoldBooster.NAME: Gilded Shrine
vexMod:GoldBooster.FLAVOR: Molten gold pours endlessly down the shrine.

vexMod:TreasureMap.NAME: Adventure Map
vexMod:TreasureMap.FLAVOR: The real treasure was the friends we made along the way.

DESCRIPTIONS: When you play your first targeted #yAttack each combat, apply #b2 #yLock-On.

vexMod:TimesightGlass.NAME: Timesight Glass
vexMod:TimesightGlass.FLAVOR: You can see yourself a few minutes before.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of every even-numbered turn, put a random card from your discard pile into your hand.

vexMod:MadnessLens.NAME: Madness Lens
vexMod:MadnessLens.FLAVOR: The Spire looks like a hellish, twisting wasteland through this glass.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to #b0 this combat.

vexMod:BrainBlaster.NAME: Brain Blaster
vexMod:BrainBlaster.FLAVOR: Holding it near your head, you feel a terrible buzzing dizziness.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon receiving attack damage, changes its intent.

vexMod:PlasmaPancake.NAME: Plasma Pancake
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b6. NL At the start of each combat, deal #b11 damage to ALL enemies.

vexMod:ChompingNoodles.NAME: Chomping Noodles
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a #y? room, raise your Max HP by #b3 and lose #b3 HP.

vexMod:RedPlottingStone.NAME: Red Plotting Stone
vexMod:RedPlottingStone.FLAVOR: Great for nefarious plans - as opposed to the Green Plotting Stone.
DESCRIPTIONS: #pGlows #psometime. NL #pRight #pclick while glowing for a #gmassive #greward. NL #pRight #pclick while not glowing to #rlose.

vexMod:TealTab.NAME: Teal Tab
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b2 copies of the #b18th card you draw each combat into your hand. They cost #b0 this combat.

vexMod:DeviousBotling.NAME: Devious Botling
vexMod:DeviousBotling.FLAVOR: A tiny little mini-bot whose prime directive is to mess with people. Twitter at @DBotling.

vexMod:WellWornAnklet.FLAVOR: Still gotta dig up the paper on this one.

vexMod:GorgonsHead.NAME: Gorgon's Head
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL enemies start combat with #b2 less #yStrength.

vexMod:OrbOfGreed.NAME: Orb of Greed
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yChannel #b1 #yGolden #yπLightning.
Orb: Deals damage to random enemies. NL Produces #yGold.

vexMod:ImprovementManual.NAME: Improvement Manual
vexMod:ImprovementManual.FLAVOR: Ahh, so THAT's how you make a card Innate!

vexMod:ThirteenHourStone.NAME: Thirteen-Hour Stone
vexMod:ThirteenHourStone.FLAVOR: Number nine is the most important.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you you draw #b13 cards, draw #b1 card.

vexMod:LastWill.NAME: Last Will
vexMod:LastWill.FLAVOR: Your possessions are bequeathed to The Merchant.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b111 #yGold. NL When you die or win, @DBotling tweets about your run.

vexMod:Starfruit.NAME: Starfruit
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b6. At the start of each combat, shuffle #b3 #yMagical #yFruit into your draw pile.
Magical Fruit are 0-cost Attacks that deal damage, heal you, draw 1 card, and Exhaust.

vexMod:FallenStar.NAME: Fallen Fruit
vexMod:FallenStar.FLAVOR: This one must have fallen off the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, shuffle #b2 #yMagical #yFruit into your draw pile.
Magical Fruit are 0-cost Attacks that deal damage, heal you, draw 1 card, and Exhaust.

vexMod:PaidLearning.NAME: Paid Education
vexMod:PaidLearning.FLAVOR: That was just the down payment. Two hundred thousand dollars in loans remain.

vexMod:NotEnergy.NAME: Ne donne pas d'énergie
vexMod:NotEnergy.FLAVOR: The images are looking awfully treacherous today.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Energy.

vexMod:NewsTicker.NAME: News Ticker
vexMod:NewsTicker.FLAVOR: Keep up with the latest and greatest of the Spire!
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click once per combat to see the latest Tweet by @DBotling.

vexMod:MagicMissile.NAME: Wand of Magic Missile
vexMod:MagicMissile.FLAVOR: The end of this plain wooden staff glows dimly with magical force.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, deal #b2-5 damage to a random enemy #b3 times.

vexMod:FluxCapacitor.NAME: Clock Rock
vexMod:FluxCapacitor.FLAVOR: Tick tock goes the clock rock.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, set your run timer to #b-10 minutes. At the end of combat, rewind your run timer by #b30 seconds. When your run timer hits #b0, you #rlose.

vexMod:StoryBook.NAME: Story Book
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, the Story grows.

vexMod:GrifterSatchel.NAME: Grifter Satchel
vexMod:GrifterSatchel.FLAVOR: Used for many a not-so-good deed.
DESCRIPTIONS: All combats drop an additional Colorless card reward.

vexMod:Pepega.NAME: Pepega.
DESCRIPTIONS: Really dude? That was just Pepega.

vexMod:MegatonBomb.NAME: Superbombomb
vexMod:MegatonBomb.FLAVOR: A superweapon beyond any technology. Who made this...?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #rlose #b1 HP from #gradiation #gpoisoning. NL #pRight #pclick: #rDestroy #rthis #rrelic #rand #rall #renemies.

vexMod:NewClearReactor.NAME: New, Clear Reactor
vexMod:NewClearReactor.FLAVOR: Totally safe! Good for the environment! Fosters mutations!
DESCRIPTIONS: Energy is conserved between turns and combats. You no longer gain Energy each turn. Set your energy to #b100 upon pickup and at the start of each Act.

vexMod:SpireShuffle.NAME: Spire Shuffle
vexMod:SpireShuffle.FLAVOR: To the left! To the right! Woo-hoo!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack, move to the right. Whenever you play a #ySkill, move to the left.

vexMod:HealthChanger.NAME: Place Exchanger
DESCRIPTIONS: #pRight #pclick: Exchange places with an enemy. Activate once per combat.

vexMod:Incredibleness.NAME: Energy Relic
vexMod:Incredibleness.FLAVOR: What do you mean you're still tired?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E] in real life.

vexMod:RockOfEvil.NAME: Horrorstone
vexMod:RockOfEvil.FLAVOR: Holding it fills you with terror. Your only goal is to lose it yet it always winds up back in your pocket.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, obtain #b666 #yGold and a random #rBlight.

vexMod:RockFriend.NAME: Stone Buddy
DESCRIPTIONS: Every other turn, assists with a helpful effect.
Let's draw some more, shall we?

vexMod:RealismEngine.NAME: Realism Engine
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you drink a potion, burp.

vexMod:FutureThief.NAME: Future Thief Gloves
DESCRIPTIONS: #pRight #pclick: Steal a card from yourself in the future.

vexMod:RockBasket.NAME: Rock Basket
vexMod:RockBasket.FLAVOR: Because y'all already know I'm the best.

vexMod:RelicLauncher.NAME: Relic Launcher

vexMod:XConverter.NAME: Xtacy
vexMod:XConverter.FLAVOR: Sure to liven up your nights!
DESCRIPTIONS: After you play a cost X card, gain [E] .

vexMod:StarEater.FLAVOR: One by one, the stars in the sky wink out.

vexMod:Spotlight.NAME: Spotlight
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b3 #yStarlit to ALL enemies.

vexMod:Trinoculars.NAME: Trinoculars
vexMod:Trinoculars.FLAVOR: Lets you see three times as many stars!

vexMod:FakeStar.NAME: Fake Star
vexMod:FakeStar.FLAVOR: But if you squint it looks pretty real!

vexMod:GravityRainbow.NAME: Gravitational Rainbow
vexMod:GravityRainbow.FLAVOR: "But rainbows aren't affected by gravity!" you say. Well, pah!

vexMod:MusicMaker.NAME: Pipes of Chaos

vexMod:BottledTune.FLAVOR: You crack the lid and hear a faint sound.

At the start of each combat, #ybard:Queue a

vexMod:SingingFlower.NAME: Singing Flower
vexMod:SingingFlower.FLAVOR: It's, like, in tune with the planet's energy, dude!

vexMod:AutoTuner.NAME: Auto Tuner
vexMod:AutoTuner.FLAVOR: Sure, it sounds strange, but it's technically tuned!

vexMod:Warpstrument.NAME: Warped Instrument
vexMod:Warpstrument.FLAVOR: This twisted bunch of tubes never quite sounds the same.

vexMod:AudienceDoll.NAME: Audience Doll
vexMod:AudienceDoll.FLAVOR: Always there to listen and offer support!

vexMod:DeadRequiem.NAME: Dead Requiem
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you perform a #ybard:Melody, #ybard:Queue a random #ybard:Note.

vexMod:SolarSystemDiorama.NAME: Galaxy Diorama
DESCRIPTIONS: The additional effects of your #ySolar and #yLunar cards are always active.

vexMod:CleansingRadio.NAME: Anger Radio
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you #ybard:Queue #b3 of the same #ybard:Note in a single turn, deal #b5 damage to ALL enemies.

vexMod:ThrowingStar.NAME: Throwing Star
vexMod:ThrowingStar.FLAVOR: Unorthodox use for the stars, but it's OK.

vexMod:RainbowShades.NAME: Rainbow Shades
vexMod:RainbowShades.FLAVOR: Lookin' to the sky in style.

vexMod:Demotivationator.NAME: Demotivationator
vexMod:Demotivationator.FLAVOR: "ALL the people in the Tri-State Area will be too lazy to work! MWAHAHAHA!"
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] and #ybard:Inspiration #b-50 at the start of your turn.

vexMod:PreRecordedMusic.NAME: Mediocre Mixtape
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, perform a random #ybard:Melody.

vexMod:RestingRock.NAME: Rock of Resting
vexMod:RestingRock.FLAVOR: Just sit back and - for awhile.

vexMod:ElectroStars.NAME: Cyborg Telescope
vexMod:ElectroStars.FLAVOR: You realize now that every electric volt is a tiny star too.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b3 Orb slots. Whenever you play a #yStar, #yChannel #b1 #yLightning.

vexMod:FutureSight.NAME: Sight of Future Skies
vexMod:FutureSight.FLAVOR: You see it all laid out. One day the sky shall burn away.
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL Whenever you play a card, put it on the bottom of your draw pile.

vexMod:MiniStar.NAME: Pet Star
vexMod:MiniStar.FLAVOR: Feed with hydrogen and helium daily.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, increment the #yStellar #yPhase.
